timelapse.changes:
2.1.0.3: - New features --- Date correction for cameras with slow/fast clocks - Fixes --- 3x speedup on image loading --- 2x speedup on image scrolling when using arrow keys --- Counter data controls can be cleared (i.e., empty) --- Context menu (Copy Forward etc) now appears properly From Previous release - Video files (.avi, .mpg) now supported (.avi, .mpg) --- see the Video Player - New organization of images: --- images can be stored in sub-folders --- image subfolders can be added at any time --- RelativePath field stores subfolder location - Myriads of interface changes and bug fixes - User maual updated - Considerable changes made under the covers.
To see other version history details, select Help/About and click the Version History button.
